name: Ruins & Switch
description:
Switch void and solid blocks!
Play a platform where YOU are the one to build the platforms with this unique mechanic.

4 Different Worlds, 28 levels
Each with their own spice and flavor. From an intricate jungle to an erupting volcano.

5 Different Boss
Fight back the baron Baron von Zwitsch against 4 unique boss with their own logic, including a Secret Ending one.

A retro puzzle-platformer
A Side-scroller platformer with 8-bit music and 8-bit art-style.

Using keyboard is possible but a gamepad is advised.

Steam Achievements are currently not supported.
